history.proof: apply Build_PreOrder. - intros x. qsimpl time: 1 use: po_natPlus_R. - intros x y z Hxy Hyz. qsimpl time: 1 use: po_natPlus_R. transitivity y; auto. + hauto l: on depth: 3. + hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : THeap' Unable to unify "PreOrder Krelation" with "Krelation x x".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "PreOrder Krelation" on hypothesis of type "Krelation x y".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, z : THeap' H0 : forall (n : nat) (c : htype), y n = Some c -> exists c' : htype, z n = Some c' /\\ ht_ord c' c H1 : forall (n : nat) (c : htype), x n = Some c -> exists c' : htype, y n = Some c' /\\ ht_ord c' c PreOrder_Reflexive : Reflexive Krelation PreOrder_Transitive : Transitive Krelation Unable to unify "PreOrder Krelation" with "Krelation x z".

original: apply Build_PreOrder. - intros x. apply po_natPlus_R. - intros x y z Hxy Hyz. apply po_natPlus_R in Hxy. apply po_natPlus_R in Hyz. apply po_natPlus_R. transitivity y; auto.
